result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ga: bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.orig: bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.html: bhí orainn codladh in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ponchtml: ḃí orainn codlaḋ in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.html: níor chodail mé móránI didn't sleep much.
result.ponchtml: níor ċodail mé móránI didn't sleep much.

result.eng: I go to bed/to sleep at eleven at the latest.
result.ga: téim a chodladh ag a haon déag ar a dhéanaí
result.orig: téim a chodladh ag a haon déag ar a dhéanaí
result.html: téim a chodladh ag a haon déag ar a dhéanaíI go to bed/to sleep at eleven at the latest.
result.ponchtml: téim a ċodlaḋ ag a haon déag ar a ḋéanaíI go to bed/to sleep at eleven at the latest.

result.eng: What time do you go to bed/to sleep?
result.ga: cén t-am a théann tú a chodladh
result.orig: cén t-am a théann tú a chodladh
result.html: cén t-am a théann tú a chodladhWhat time do you go to bed/to sleep?
result.ponchtml: cén t-am a ṫéann tú a ċodlaḋWhat time do you go to bed/to sleep?

result.eng: Sleep descended on him in the train.
result.ga: thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.orig: thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.html: thit a chodladh air sa traeinSleep descended on him in the train.
result.ponchtml: ṫit a ċodlaḋ air sa traeinSleep descended on him in the train.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: luigh máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: luigh máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: luigh máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: luiġ máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: She would sleep on a matress in the corridor.
result.ga: chodlaíodh sí ar thocht sa dorchla
result.orig: chodlaíodh sí ar thocht sa dorchla
result.html: chodlaíodh sí ar thocht sa dorchlaShe would sleep on a matress in the corridor.
result.ponchtml: ċodlaíoḋ sí ar ṫoċt sa dorċlaShe would sleep on a matress in the corridor.

result.eng: He eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ga: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.orig: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.html: bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladhHe eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na súile ag drud uirṫi leis an ċodlaḋHe eyes were closing with sleep.

result.eng: He would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ga: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.orig: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.html: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ponchtml: b'éigean dó luí ar ṗutóga folṁa go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
